name: @minko-fe/ts-template-monorepo
description: a template for typescript project or plugin
author: hemengke <https://github.com/hemengke1997>

scripts.release: pnpm run build && pnpm publish --access public
scripts.changelog: conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s -r 0 && git add CHANGELOG.md
scripts.bump: pnpm changelog && bumpp packages/*/package.json package.json CHANGELOG.md --commit --push --tag -all
